text: Hi folks! We have prepared a draft proposal for Google Season of Docs: <https://github.com/rstats-gsod/gsod2022/wiki/GSOD-2022-Proposal>. Feel free to suggest edits. We would like to have a steering committee, similar to last time: <https://github.com/rstats-gsod/gsod2021/wiki/GSOD-2021-Proposal> (scroll down or search for "volunteers" to find the section. If you are interested in this role, please let me know - it should involve a meeting once every two months or so, and contributing in-between by reviewing pull requests/joining in the discussion on Slack to steer the project. A stipend of $500 can be made to a limited number of volunteers (I currently allowed for 1 in the budget but that could go up a bit).
